column2: Honeywell seeks clarity on U.S. airline display panel proposal NEW YORK
column3: Sept 24 Honeywell on Tuesday said it wanted U.S. air safety regulators to explain a new proposal to compel airlines to change cockpit instrument panels the company makes for Boeing planes over concerns that Wi-Fi signals could wipe out crucial readings and create a risk of crashing.
